targets.query: SELECT mean("targetTemp") AS "target", mean("virtualTemp") AS "current", mean("targetTemp") - mean("pg2.hysteresis") AS "start", mean("targetTemp") + mean("pg2.offset") AS "stop" FROM "monitoring2" WHERE ("device.name" = 'heatpump-ctrl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT
  (max("inputs"::integer) & 4) / 4 AS "COMP",
  (max("inputs"::integer) & 8) / 8 AS "DEF"
FROM "monitoring2"
WHERE "device.name" = 'heatpump-ctrl' AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("s3Temp") - mean("s1Temp") FROM "monitoring2" WHERE ("device.name" = 'heatpump-ctrl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT
  (min("inputs"::integer) & 4) / 4 AS "COMP"
FROM "monitoring2"
WHERE "device.name" = 'heatpump-ctrl' AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("valve") FROM "xymd1" WHERE ("device.name" = 'thermostat-boris') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("p") FROM "current_power" WHERE ("device.name" = 'heat_pump') AND ("phase" = 'A') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("p") FROM "current_power" WHERE ("device.name" = 'heat_pump') AND ("phase" = 'B') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("p") FROM "current_power" WHERE ("device.name" = 'heat_pump') AND ("phase" = 'C') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT
  (max("inputs"::integer) & 4) / 4 AS "COMP"
FROM "monitoring2"
WHERE "device.name" = 'heatpump-ctrl' AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("s3Temp") - mean("s1Temp") FROM "monitoring2" WHERE ("device.name" = 'heatpump-ctrl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT
  (max("inputs"::integer) & 4) / 4 AS "COMP"
FROM "monitoring2"
WHERE "device.name" = 'heatpump-ctrl' AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
